Here is an example with Show-UI that I did a bit ago.

		$te=New-Window -ResizeMode NoResize -Title 'Create User' -SizeToContent Height -Width 320 -WindowStartupLocation CenterOwner -Show -On_Loaded { $FirstName. Focus() } {
		    Grid -Rows 14 -Columns (            
    'Auto', # Automatically sized header row            
    '1*'   # The remaining space will be where the list of sessions is displayed                     
        ) -Margin "0,0,0,12" {
				
				New-Menu -ControlName Menu -Row 0 -ColumnSpan 2 {             
					New-MenuItem "File" {
						New-MenuItem "M_ultiple Users" -on_click {             
							$window. Close()
							Stop-Transcript -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
							echo "exists" | Out-File C:\UserCreate\exitscript. txt
							echo "other" | Out-File C:\UserCreate\other. txt
							}   					
						New-MenuItem "E_xit" -on_click {             
							$window. Close()
							Stop-Transcript -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
							Exit
							echo "exists" | Out-File C:\UserCreate\exitscript. txt
							}             
						}
					New-MenuItem "Help" {
						New-MenuItem "About" -on_click {
							New-Window -width 250 -height 200 -Title "About" -ResizeMode NoResize -show {
						      New-Grid -Rows 8 -Columns  ('Auto', # Automatically sized header row            
                                            '1*'   # The remaining space will be where the list of sessions is displayed                     
                                            ) -Margin "0,0,0,0" {
                                            
                                            
									New-Image -Source C:\UserCreate\ShowUI\logo. png -width "164" -height "90" -VerticalAlignment Top -HorizontalAlignment Center -row 0 -Column 0 -ColumnSpan 2 -RowSpan 6
                                    
                                    

    								    New-TextBlock -Text "Author      :" -Column 0 -Row 4 -Margin "10,0,0,0" 
                                            New-TextBlock -Text "Leonard Kelley" -Column 1 -Row 4 
                                        New-TextBlock -Text "Build Date : " -Column 0 -Row 5 -Margin "10,0,0,0" 
                                            New-TextBlock -Text "August 18 2012" -Column 1 -Row 5 

                                    New-Button "Close" -Column 1  -Row 6 -Width 100 -height 20 -HorizontalAlignment left -On_Click {Close-Control}
                                    
                                    
								
																	}

							}
								
							
					}
				New-MenuItem "Documentation" -on_click {
					$IE=new-object -com internetexplorer. application
					$IE. navigate2("https://svcdocs. svc. local/doku. php?id=creating_users")
					$IE. visible=$true
					}
				  }
				}
                New-Grid -Row 1 -Rows 7 -RowSpan 6 -ColumnSpan 2 -Columns (            
                'Auto', # Automatically sized header row            
                '1*'   # The remaining space will be where the list of sessions is displayed                     
                )  {
				New-Label "First Name :             " -Row 1
					New-TextBox -Name FirstName -Column 1 -Row 1 -Margin "1,5,12,1"
					
			    New-Label "Last Name :" -Row 2 
					New-TextBox -Name LastName -column 1 -Row 2 -Margin "1,1,12,1"
				
				New-Label "Password :" -Row 3 -Column 0
                    New-TextBox -Name Password -Column 1 -Row 3 -Margin "1,1,12,1"
					
			    New-Label "Personal Email :" -Row 4 -Column 0
					New-TextBox -Name Pemail -Column 1 -Row 4 -Margin "1,1,12,1"
					
                New-Label "Student/Emp. ID :" -Row 5 -Column 0
					New-TextBox -Name ID -Column 1 -Row 5 -Margin "1,1,12,1"
                	
			    New-Label "Dept. (Copiers) :" -row 6
			    New-ComboBox -Width 150 -row 6 -column 1 -IsTextSearchEnabled:$true -MaxDropDownHeight 110 -Name Departments -Margin "1,3,1,3" -HorizontalAlignment Left -SelectedIndex 0 {
						New-ComboBoxItem "Student"
						New-Comboboxitem "Accreditation"
						New-Comboboxitem "Admissions"
						New-Comboboxitem "Alumni"
						New-Comboboxitem "Athletics Administration"

						New-Comboboxitem "Health Care Mgmt Advocacy"
						New-Comboboxitem "Health Services"
						New-Comboboxitem "Homecoming"

                        }
					}
                    New-Label -Name OU -Column 0 -Row 7 "Orginazitional Unit :"
                        New-Button "Browse" -Name OU  -column 1 -row 7 -Margin "1,3,1,3" -Width 150 -HorizontalAlignment Left -On_Click {C:\UserCreate\Browse. ps1}
                       
			    New-Label "Group :" -Row 8 -Column 0 -VerticalAlignment Center
		            New-UniformGrid -Columns 2 -Rows 2 -Margin "0,8,4,4" -Column 1 -Row 8 -HorizontalAlignment Left {
			            New-CheckBox -Name Student 'Student' -Row 1 -Column 1 -Margin "1,4,4,1"
			            New-CheckBox -Name Faculty 'Faculty' -Row 2 -Column 2 -Margin "1,4,4,1"
			            New-CheckBox -Name Staff 'Staff' -Row 1 -Column 1 -Margin "1,4,4,1"
			            New-CheckBox -Name Administrative 'Administrative' -Row 2 -Column 2 -Margin "1,4,4,1"
		}
				New-Label "User Name:" -Row 10
					StackPanel -Margin "0,8,4,4" -Orientation Horizontal  -Row 10 -Column 1 -HorizontalAlignment Left {
						RadioButton "_Automated    " -Name Automated -IsChecked:$true
						RadioButton "_Manual    " -Name Manual
						}
        New-Label " " -Row 12 -Column 0
        
		New-Button "Create" -Width 90 -Height 30 -column 0 -row 14 -On_Click {
          
            $parent| Set-UIValue -passThru | Close-Control
			}
		New-Button "Close" -Width 90 -Height 30 -column 1 -row 14 -On_Click {
			Close-Control
			echo "exists" | Out-File "C:\UserCreate\exitscript. txt"
			exit
			}
		} 
	} 


Works pretty well, but the problem with ShowUI is that its dependent on a module, and has to be ran in single threaded apartment state. I've tried running it in a separate runspace which WPF doesn't seem to mind, but it pretty much broke everything.
